titleStmt.title: A cypres garland For the sacred forehead of our late soueraigne King Iames. / By Hugh Holland.
titleStmt.author: Holland, Hugh, d. 1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by Nicholas Okes] for Simon Waterson,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
